pr_title: SONARJAVA-3476 Improve issue location for S5843

timeline.message: SONARJAVA-3476 Improve issue location for S5843
SONARJAVA-3476 Improve issue location for S5843

timeline.bodyText: Why not simply return directly "? It does not hurt and will not make anything fail in the worst-case scenario!

+package org.sonar.java.regex.ast;
+
+import java.util.Collections;
+import java.util.List;
+
+/**
+ * This class should only be instantiated by RegexParseResult.openingQuote() and only used when using
+ * the opening quote of a regex as an issue location. It should never appear within a regex AST.
+ */
+public class OpeningQuote extends RegexSyntaxElement {
+
+  public OpeningQuote(RegexSource source) {
+    super(source, new IndexRange(-1, 0));
+  }
+
+  @Override
+  public String getText() {
+    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("getText should not be called on OpeningQuote objects.");
